H0.text: Boll weevil cause damage to which crop. Cotton

H1.text: Boll weevil cause damage to which crop. Soybeans

H2.text: Boll weevil cause damage to which crop. Wheat

H3.text: Boll weevil cause damage to which crop. Bomull

A4.text: The boll weevil feeds on cotton buds and flowers.

A5.text: The boll weevil is the most destructive cotton pest in North America.
